fulltext:
Truong Le Hoang 
PERSONAL INFORMATION 
Birthday 
29/07/1993 
Telephone (+84) 979777814 
Email  
hoangtl2907@gmail.com 
Address 
19, D14A Street, Tay Thanh Ward, Tan Phu District, Ho Chi Minh City. 
Foreign language(s): English (Toeic Certificate: 795) 
EDUCATION 
University of Information Technology - Vietnam National University, Ho Chi Minh 
City. 
Bachelor of Engineering (BEng), Information System, Advanced Education Program – 
affiliate program with Oklahoma State University 
TECHNICAL SKILLS 
• Web programing: RoR, ExtJS 
• Programing Language: C#, Java, HTML, CSS, Javascript, Ruby, Golang 
• Development tools: MS Visual Studio, Eclipse, NetBean, VIM editor 
• Database Management System: SQL Server, MySQL, PosgreSQL 
• Operating System: Windows, Ubuntu 
• Search Engines: Elasticsearch, Solr 
WORKING SKILLS 
• Problem Solving 
• Agile/ Scrum development framework 
• Teamwork (JIRA, RedMine, Trello) 
• GitHub, Gitlab, Git Workflow 
• Adaptability, willing to learn new technologies 
• High responsibility 
PROJECTS 
• Project name: coffee shop management (freelance) 
• Description: a website for user can view menu, news, event and book table; a website 
management for boss can add/delete/edit drinks, view revenue of each branch; a 
payment application for cashier can calculate bills, print bills and send revenue to 
server after a day 
• Responsibilities: 
o Back-end, and unit test 
o Fix bugs 
• Technologies:  
o Tool: MS Visual Studio, SQL Server 
o Frameworks: ASP.NET WebForm, NUnit, WCF  
________________________________________ 
• Thesis project name: Grading tours Airlink 
• Description: A web service for query ontology, sending JSON and calculate tour 
score base on answers of user for each question, an application converting MySQL 
to Ontology 
• Responsibilities:  
o Write code including server and application 
o Test and fix bug 
• Technologies: Eclipse, MySQL, Protégé 
EXPERIENCE 
❖ Sep 09, 2015 – Mar 31, 2016: Developer at Global Cybersoft VietNam. 
o Project Name: Defects analysis application 
o Description: An application that helps users sum up and analyze statistics of 
defects of products after a productive time 
o Responsibilities: 
• Write code and unit test 
• Research Elasticsearch 
o Technologies: 
• Tool: MS Visual Studio 
• DBMS: SQL server 
• Language: C# 
• Framework: Entity Framework, NEST, Newtonsoft.Json, NUnit 
❖ April 01, 2016 – July 30, 2016: .Net developer at i3solution. 
o Project Name: Hospital management 
o Description: A System including a server and a website that helps the hospital 
manage their patients, helps doctors in documenting 
o Responsibilities: 
• Back-end, and unit test 
• Fix bugs 
o Technologies: 
• Tool: MS Visual Studio 
• Language: C# 
• DBMS: SQL server 
• Framework: Entity Framework, ASP.NET MVC, WCF, Reporting 
Service. 
❖ Sep 25, 2016 – Now: Full-stack developer at LARION 
o Project Name: Medical Resources Supply 
o Description: A system that allows the hospitals find and buy medical 
instruments with a reasonable price. It also helps them to manage contracts, 
analyze their spending and saving opportunities. 
o Responsibilities: 
• Back-end, font-ent, and unit test 
• Fix bugs 
• Enhance performance 
• Team lead 
o Technologies: 
• Tool: PgAdmin, psql, Jenkin, VIM editor, Mysql Workbrench 
• Language: Ruby (RoR), Golang, Javascript 
• OS: Ubuntu 
• DBMS: PotsgreSQL, MySQL 
• Search Engine: Solr, Elasticsearch 
• Other: Kibana, Power BI 
HONORS & AWARDS 
❖ January 2019:  
o Title: Distinguished Employee of The Year 
o Issuer: Larion 
❖ January 2019:  
o Title: Distinguished Employee of The Quarter 
o Issuer: Larion 
❖ January 2018:  
o Title: Distinguished Employee of The Year 
o Issuer: Larion 
❖ January 2018:  
o Title: Distinguished Employee of The Quarter 
o Issuer: Larion
